snippet: Connecticut beat No. 6 Syracuse in the last scheduled game between the two traditional powers. Syracuse will play next season in the Atlantic Coast Conference. In other action, No. 2 Duke beat North Carolina.
abstract: Connecticut beats Syracuse, 66-58, in men's college basketball; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Connecticut beat No. 6 Syracuse in the last scheduled game between the two traditional powers. Syracuse will play next season in the Atlantic Coast Conference. In other action, No. 2 Duke beat North Carolina.

headline.seo: UConn Tops Syracuse and Duke Beats North Carolina
headline.main: UConn Tops Syracuse; Duke Beats North Carolina
